official_title: Pilot Feasibility Evaluation of a Mindfulness (Mindfulness) Intervention in Women Preparing for Chemotherapy for Breast Cancer
inclusion_criteria:
* 18 years or older
* Breast cancer diagnosis preparing to undergo chemotherapy
Healthy volunteers allowed
Must be FEMALE
Must have minimum age of 18 Years
exclusion_criteria:
* Under the age of 18
* Cannot provide informed consent
